title: Mark Levin Audio Rewind - 3/10/22
description:
On Thursday's Mark Levin Show, Ben Ferguson fills in for Mark. The god of the Democrat party is green energy, and their idol is the electric car. This White House said that high gas prices were because of COVID and now they say because it's because of Putin. If you don't submit to their ideology, they will hit you in the pocketbook. The Biden White House is literally laughing in your face while inflation is at a 40-year high. Then, VP Kamala Harris visited Poland today to give a speech and failed miserably. Press Secretary Jen Psaki is also failing at defending the Administration's disastrous policies on the economy and energy but continues to blame Putin for "temporary" increases while enlisting CNN to cover them with disinformation. Later, Putin came to power by killing his own people while Boris Yeltsin was roaming around drunk. Putin's war crimes won't stop in Ukraine and madmen don't stop on their own. As long as Biden allows him to get away with it, he will.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
